description: Computes a binary map of surface locations where the brainmask.mgz has been edited.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: The subject for which the binary map will be computed.

self.title: Self Output Flag
self.description: Output will be on self instead of fsaverage.

no_cleanup.title: No Cleanup Flag
no_cleanup.description: Do not clean up temporary files.

left_hemisphere.title: Left Hemisphere Flag
left_hemisphere.description: Perform operation only on the left hemisphere.

right_hemisphere.title: Right Hemisphere Flag
right_hemisphere.description: Perform operation only on the right hemisphere.

no_surfs.title: No Surfaces Flag
no_surfs.description: Do not compute surfaces, only statistics.
